meta.title: Prosperify - Sovereign AI for your data
meta.description: Optimize your document management with Prosperify's sovereign AI. Security, accuracy and seamless integration.

hero.subtitle: Turn your documents into actionable insights with Prosperify

workflow.title: A
workflow.subtitle: Fewer clicks, more impact. Save time at every step of your document management.

unify.subtitle: All types of data: structured or unstructured

chat.botWelcome: Hello! I can help you search through your indexed PDF documents. Ask me a question about your documents.

answer.middle: the initial term of the contract is

features.title: An All-in-One
features.subtitle: A unified platform that turns your documents into actionable insights with accuracy and governance.

precision.title: Accuracy & Trust
precision.subtitle: Sentence-level citations
precision.description: Answers linked to the exact sentence in the document. Automatic flagging of uncertainty zones.

coverage.title: Document coverage
coverage.subtitle: Multimodal analysis
coverage.description: Full analysis: text, tables, figures and visuals. Unified processing of structured and unstructured data.

performance.title: Performance & Experience
performance.subtitle: Real-time results
performance.description: Parallel search across relevant sources. Progressive, real-time results.

governance.title: Governance & Isolation
governance.subtitle: Strict compartmentalization
governance.description: Strict assistant-level isolation. Fine-grained role controls for import and consultation.

orchestration.title: Agentic orchestration
orchestration.subtitle: Proactive self-correction
orchestration.description: Automatic evaluation of answer quality. Self-correction and reinforced validation with verified citations.

differentiation.title: Strategic differentiation
differentiation.subtitle: Sovereign European solution
differentiation.description: A European sovereign alternative to extra-European solutions, delivering far more than text search: a complete and verifiable document intelligence.

sovereignty.subtitle: European hosting compliant with GDPR. Maximum security, guaranteed sovereignty.

mainCard.description: Data centers in Germany and France. End-to-end encryption, full traceability, native GDPR compliance.

cloud.title: Dedicated Cloud
cloud.description: Hybrid or fully on-prem deployment depending on your sovereignty needs. Customizable and scalable architecture.

encryption.title: Advanced Encryption
encryption.description: AES-256 and TLS for your data in transit and at rest. Maximum protection against any intrusion.

kubernetes.title: Kubernetes Infrastructure
kubernetes.description: Isolated and resilient architecture with guaranteed high availability.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: GDPR, NIS2, AI Act compliance. Your sensitive data in safe hands.

supervision.title: Continuous monitoring
supervision.description: Role-based access control (RBAC) and continuous system monitoring to guarantee full transparency.

architecture.subtitle: Each step optimized for reliable, sourced and relevant answers.

steps.title: Collection & Preprocessing
steps.description: Automatic centralization of your documents from all sources with optimized cleaning and normalization.

steps.title: Analysis & Labeling
steps.description: Automatic content extraction and AI-optimized representations for contextual understanding.

steps.title: Segmentation & Indexing
steps.description: Intelligent chunking and advanced indexing for instant retrieval of relevant information.

steps.title: Query Understanding
steps.description: Smart intent analysis to maximize the relevance and accuracy of results.

steps.title: Hybrid Search
steps.description: Simultaneous multi-source querying: textual, visual and contextual for exhaustive coverage.

steps.title: Filtering & Traceability
steps.description: Qualified results with full citations to guarantee transparency and source verification.

steps.title: Interactive Display
steps.description: Intuitive, customizable interface for instant access to your critical information.

integration.subtitle: Deploy Prosperify in a few days without reworking your existing tools.

steps.title: Scoping & objectives
steps.description: Choose the number of AI assistants, files to process, users, etc.

steps.title: Connecting your documents
steps.description: Each team selects and organizes the key files.

steps.title: Assistant configuration
steps.description: Configure assistants, business rules and confidentiality levels.

steps.title: Manage & update
steps.description: Add, archive or delete documents over time.

aiChat.inputPlaceholder: Ask a question about your documents... (You can drag and drop PDFs)
aiChat.inputHint: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for a new line

pdf.title: Verdi Contract.pdf
pdf.article1Body: This Contract aims to organize the collaboration between VERDI and the PARTNER, including defining the research scope, pooling material and human resources, producing reports, and valorizing the results obtained.
pdf.article2Part1: This Contract enters into force on the date of signature for an initial term of
pdf.article2Highlight2: It may be renewed by express written agreement of the Parties. In the event of non-renewal, the obligations relating to confidentiality and intellectual property shall remain in force.
pdf.article2Part3: This provision constitutes a guarantee of continuity, even after the end of the collaboration.
pdf.article3Body: "Results" means any data, method, prototype, software, report or publication generated.
pdf.article4Part1: VERDI undertakes to provide its scientific expertise, laboratories and qualified staff.
pdf.article4Highlight1: In addition, the principles of scientific ethics and safety must be respected at all times.

products.subtitle: Choose the level of control that fits you best: secure cloud, hybrid deployment or fully local.

offers.title: Hybrid

description.part1: , your data and infrastructure stay with you. The perfect balance between

features: Your data stays on your infrastructure
AI model hosted and maintained by us

faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Prosperify and the security of your data.

items.question: Are my data accessible to third parties or to your teams?
items.answer: No. Your data are isolated, encrypted and never shared. Even our teams do not have access to them.

items.question: Does the AI continuously learn from my data?
items.answer: No. Your data are never used to train our models. However, you can add or update your documents at any time to enrich your assistant's answers.

items.question: Is this suitable for confidential or legal documents?
items.answer: Yes. Prosperify is designed to process sensitive documents securely, in compliance with legal standards.

items.question: How many users can use Prosperify at the same time?
items.answer: As many as you need. The system is built for teams of any size.

items.question: How long does it take to deploy Prosperify in my company?
items.answer: The timeline mainly depends on you: once your documents are ready, deployment takes 2 to 3 days.

items.question: Do users need training?
items.answer: No. The interface is intuitive and easy to use. A few minutes are enough to get started. We also offer onboarding to help you adopt best practices from day one.

contact.subtitle: Join the companies that already leverage AI to optimize their document management.

footer.tagline: Turn your data into a competitive advantage.
